articles.title: Special Report of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK
articles.content:
Special Report of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea issued the following special report on Thursday:
					The Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee solemnly announces that it has decided as follows, reflecting the unanimous desire and ardent request of all party members, service personnel and people to hold the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the Party and the revolution, glorify his sacred revolutionary life and undying revolutionary feats forever and surely carry to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu:
					
					1. The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will be laid in state at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche.
					
					2. The statue of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will be erected with respect.
					
					3. February 16, the greatest auspicious holiday of the nation when the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il was born, will be instituted as the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					4. Portraits of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il with smile on his face and towers to his immortality will be built across the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Syria
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Syria
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria, on Tuesday.
					The message said:
					
					I, on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on my own, extend warm congratulations to Your Excellency on assuming the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, wishing Your Excellency success in your noble and responsible work. 
					
					Please accept, Your Excellency, my best wishes for your good health and happiness and the Korean people's greater progress and prosperity under your wise leadership.

articles.title: Condolences to Kim Jong Un from Nigerien President
articles.content:
Condolences to Kim Jong Un from Nigerien President
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of condolences from Nigerien President Mahamadou Issoufou on Dec. 22 last year on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The message said:
					
					Your Excellency Leader, the great successor,
					
					I received the sad news that the great leader of the DPRK H.E. Kim Jong Il passed away.
					
					At this moment of sorrow I, on behalf of the Nigerien government and people, express deepest condolences to you and, at the same time, extend sympathy to the Korean people.
					
					May his soul rest in peace.
					
					Please accept, Your Excellency leader, the great successor, the assurances of highest consideration.

articles.title: Condolences to Kim Jong Un from Dominican Party Leader
articles.content:
Condolences to Kim Jong Un from Dominican Party Leader
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un on Dec. 30 last year received a message of condolences from Chairman Ramon Almanzar, General Secretary Ivan Rodriguez and International Secretary Julio Diaz Campusano of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Alternative Party of Dominica, on the passing away of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					The message said:
					
					The Central Committee of the Revolutionary Alternative Party of Dominica expresses deepest condolences on the passing of Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, and wish you great success in your noble work for leading socialist construction. 
					
					Glory to Comrade Kim Il Sung, founder of socialism in the DPRK, and great leader Kim Jong Il who are always with you.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Books to Grand People's Study House
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Books to Grand People's Study House
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is translating the lifetime desire of leader Kim Jong Il into a brilliant reality, sent many books to the Grand People's Study House on Jan. 2 and 3 when the people greeted the New Year in profound sorrow over his demise.
					Among the books were those on military affairs, those helpful to the promotion of working people's health, those on science and technology of building houses which show a global trend of housing construction, those on horticulture, food processing, animal care and other books giving profound common knowledge about various fields.

articles.title: Set of Silver Tea Utensils Gifted to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Set of Silver Tea Utensils Gifted to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- A set of silver tea utensils is among the gifts presented to President Kim Il Sung by world progressives. It was presented to him by a government delegation of Pakistan when it was visiting Pyongyang to participate in the celebration of the 20th DPRK anniversary.
					The members of the delegation prepared the gift with deep reverence for the President, who turned Korea into a socialist power.
					
					Sets of tea things are widely used in Pakistan.
					
					They made a special order for a tea service set and had it carved with an emblem symbolizing Pakistan.
					
					The gift mirrors an ardent desire of the Pakistani people for the President to enjoy good health and successfully guide the cause of human emancipation as well as their sincere hope for the development of their friendship with the Korean people.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Makes Field Survey of Coal Mine
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim on Increasing Coal Production
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Wednesday made field survey of the Jenam Coal Mine under the Tokchon Area Coal Mining Complex which is stepping up the drive for increased production to implement the tasks laid in the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and the joint New Year editorial in response to the letter of the working people in South Hamgyong Province.
					He went down Pit No. 2 of the mine to give pep-talks to the coal miners and learn in detail about the matters arising in mining operations.
					
					Then the premier convened a working meeting of officials concerned to discuss the smooth supply of coal urgently needed for several sectors of the national economy. 
					
					The meeting stressed that in order to increase the coal production, the food of industry, it is important to concentrate efforts on giving precedence to tunneling, as already indicated by the Party, and provide enough reserve cutting faces and promising pits for normal coal production. 
					
					It also underlined the need for the electric power industrial sector to supply without letup electricity for coal production and for the forestry and railway transport sectors to ensure on a preferential basis the production and carrying of prop timbers. 
					
					Besides, detailed steps were taken at the meeting to improve the supply service for the coal miners.
					
					At the meeting, the premier called on all the participants to make tangible contributions to building a thriving nation by decisively increasing coal output under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean People Pleased with Special Report
articles.content:
Korean People Pleased with Special Report
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the special report of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea on Thursday, all the Korean people are overcome by ardent yearning for leader Kim Jong Il.
					A department director of the Ministry of Electronic Industry, Ho Chol, told KCNA:
					
					"The special report reflects the desire of the entire Korean people, including the servicepersons. It marks another landmark event in realizing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader.
					
					The special report announced that February 16, Kim Jong Il' birthday, will be instituted as the Day of the Shining Star. It gives a great pleasure to the Korean and all other people across the world.
					
					With the institution of the Day, his sacred history will continue.
					
					The undying exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the country and people will remain long in the memory of the people along with the Day of the Shining Star."
					
					Jo Sin Ok, a section chief of the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute, said:
					
					"February 16 is the greatest holiday for the Korean people.
					
					The special report represents the Korean people's wish to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever.
					
					I will bring into full bloom beautiful flowers to significantly commemorate the Day of the Shining Star."

articles.title: Korean Servicepersons Hail Special Report
articles.content:
Korean Servicepersons Hail Special Report
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency Thursday released a special report of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea on keeping in state leader Kim Jong Il at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace.
					Upon receiving the report, the Korean people, including the servicepersons, harden their determination to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as their eternal leader.
					
					An officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, Choe Yong Guk, told KCNA:
					
					"The report reflects the unanimous desire and ardent request of all people to eternally hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					I was terribly grieved to bid my last farewell to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Seeing his pictures in newspapers and on TV, I have sorely missed him. Fortunately, I can visit the Kumsusan Memorial Palace anytime to pay high respects to the leader lying in state."
					
					An officer, Han Yong Sim, said:
					
					"The image of leader Kim Jong Il with a bright smile on his face gives me pleasure and strength.
					
					I am very pleased to hear that he will be laid in state at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche."

articles.title: Korean People's Desire to Be Realized
articles.content:
Korean People's Desire to Be Realized
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are rejoiced to receive the special report issued by the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Ri Yong Gum, a 57-year-old Pyongyang citizen, told KCNA:
					
					"The Korean people will have their great desire realized. It is the duty and obligation of all the Koreans to always hold in high esteem leader Kim Jong Il, who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of people."
					
					Pak In Gyu, 56, a Pyongyang citizen, said, "I will dedicate my all to erecting leader Kim Jong Il's statue on the highest level."
					
					Kim Mi Yong, a section chief of Pyongyang Department Store No. 1, said:
					
					"Listening to the special report, I thought of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					In his lifetime he performed great feats for the country and the people but never allowed anything to be done for himself, like erecting his statue and monuments. The Korean people felt so regretful for having no statue of Kim Jong Il to visit for mourning when he passed away.
					
					I used to be touched so much each time I listened to news of the leader tirelessly guiding the building of a thriving nation, providing valuable wealth of the country. The Korean people will erect his statues and portraits as well as towers to his immortality across the country to hand down through generations his great exploits."

articles.title: Modern Greenhouse Built in Bioengineering Branch
articles.content:
Modern Greenhouse Built in Bioengineering Branch
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- A greenhouse has been built on a modern basis at the Bioengineering Branch of the DPRK State Academy of Sciences.
					The greenhouse breaks into blocks for scientific research, dwarf apple tree slip production and remote control room.
					
					The research block is designed to make experiments on breeding of dry-field crop strains, seedling tissue culture, paddy-field crops and fishes.
					
					Another block is capable of acclimatizing a large number of seedlings at a time.
					
					The remote control room adjusts temperature, moisture, light, carbonic acid gas and other necessary conditions.
					
					Shading screens, floodlights and irrigation system are all controlled by computers.

articles.title: Official of Chongryon Blasts Lee Myung Bak's High Treason
articles.content:
Official of Chongryon Blasts Lee Myung Bak's High Treason
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Tuesday released a statement denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its high treason.
					The statement said that the hearts of all the officials of the KYL and Korean youth and students in Japan are now afire with the pledge to take a thousand-fold revenge upon the Lee group which committed unpardonable treachery and crimes against ethics during the nation's great mourning over the loss of the father of the nation.
					
					It went on:
					
					All the fellow countrymen were overcome with indescribable grief over the demise of the great General Kim Jong Il and Japanese youth and other youth and students in the world and even those who professed anti-communism expressed condolences on his demise. But the Lee group seriously hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation and committed such high treason as suppressing various circles of south Korea who wished to mourn his passing.
					
					The group rubbed salt into the wounds of the compatriots grieving over the great loss to the nation and, not content with this, issued a warrant of arrest for Hwang Hye Ro, co-representative of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea who visited Pyongyang to express condolences before the bier of the father of the nation.
					
					This more glaringly proved that one can hardly find even the slightest self-reproach from the group for its crimes against ethics and treachery nor expect even an iota of effort to improve the inter-Korean relations from it.
					
					No matter how desperately the puppet group works, the Korean youth and students in Japan will uphold the dear respected Kim Jong Un, another sun of the nation, and achieve national reunification without fail.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Issues White Paper Slamming Lee Group's Treachery
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Issues White Paper Slamming Lee Group's Treachery
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a white paper Thursday to inform the world of the crimes the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors committed last year by pushing the inter-Korean relations to the lowest ebb out of its hideous crimes perpetrated over the last four years since its seizure of power.
					According to it, the group totally denied the DPRK's proposal for inter-Korean dialogue.
					
					On Jan. 5 last year the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK in a joint statement proposed to the south Korean authorities, political parties and organizations to hold wide-ranging dialogue and negotiations.
					
					The puppet authorities, however, groundlessly spoke ill of the DPRK's proposal for dialogue from the outset, saying "there is no sincerity in it and it is no more than tactics of the united front."
					
					Moreover, they flatly turned down the proposal for dialogue by putting up the "dismantlement of nuclear program" and solution to the "Cheonan" warship case and the Yonphyong issue and other unreasonable issues as preconditions.
					
					They went the lengths of turning their faces away from dialogue, impudently decrying even the authority of their dialogue partner.
					
					After being compelled to appear at the preliminary military talks, they persistently insisted on the solution to the warship sinking case and Yonphyong Island incident, deliberately creating complexity. They did not hesitate to commit such reckless act as unilaterally walking out of the venue of the talks.
					
					The Lee group derailed not only Red Cross talks and contacts between the north and the south for solving humanitarian issues but NGO dialogue.
					
					As a result, all cooperation projects between the north and the south were suspended, leaving many non-governmental businesses in south Korea bankrupt or forcing them to stop their operations. The south Koreans who eked out their living through cooperation projects were put on the crossroads of life and death.
					
					The Lee group made abortive the joint national events slated to take place on the anniversaries of the publication of the historic inter-Korean declarations.
					
					It prevented the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps from having communication with the north for discussing a joint declaration of women's organizations in the north and the south to be made public on the anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising. It also disallowed the visit of those concerned of the south side funeral committee to Kaesong to receive a message of condolence sent by the DPRK side on the death of Pak Yong Gil, widow of Rev. Mun Ik Hwan. 
					
					The crimes of Lee group are proved by the heinous moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and anti-DPRK smear campaign. 
					
					Last year alone, Lee visited the U.S. several times to beg for support to his confrontation policy and openly let loose such reckless remarks that his north policy would remain unchanged despite domestic and foreign criticism.  
					
					The group imposed a heavy penalty upon Rev. Han Sang Ryol on charge of violation of the "National Security Law" after keeping him behind bars for more than a year and suppressed the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and other organizations in south Korea after labeling them as "enemy benefiting organizations". 
					
					The group of traitors disconnected more than 90 internet websites branding them as "pro-north ones" and deleted at least 80 000 notices and arrested all those concerned last year. 
					
					They kicked off anti-DPRK plots ceaselessly including spy-ring case and incident of assassination group, infusing confrontation atmosphere. 
					
					The Lee group's confrontation moves were at maximum late in December last year when the nation suffered the greatest loss. 
					
					No sooner had the sad news of the great loss to the nation been released than the group of puppets convened a "state security meeting" and "emergency state affairs meeting" and put Chongwadae and Administration, puppet army and police on "emergency alert guard and duty" leveling the gun at the fellow countrymen shedding tears in great grief. They dared foolishly try to break the single-minded unity of the DPRK talking about "taking counteraction by separating inhabitants from their leadership".
					
					The south Korean authorities and the group of the "Grand National Party" desperately slandered and insulted pictures of the people in the north expressing condolences and totally banned the Pyongyang visits of south Korean opposition parties and organizations of different social standings. Even the south Korean puppet group brutally suppressed south Korean youths and students and civic organizations for expressing condolences in the incense-burning altars installed by themselves. 
					
					They let over 30 right-wing conservative organizations flock to the forefront areas along the military demarcation line to scatter anti-DPRK leaflets whose content was hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and inciting disturbance on the day of bidding last farewell.
					
					Another crime is that the group of traitors escalated the reckless confrontation and war moves.
					
					Last year the group created the crisis of grave military clashes and seriously endangered the peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and the region.
					
					It committed such unprecedentedly hideous provocations as daringly insulting the supreme leadership of the DPRK one after another last year.
					
					All the facts show that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is the number one group of maniacs keen on confrontation and war, the white paper said, warning that the group will face only merciless punishment.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Pull Its Forces out of S. Korea at Earliest Possible Date
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Pull Its Forces out of S. Korea at Earliest Possible Date
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The building of a peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula entirely depends on the attitude of the United States, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed article.
					It demands the U.S. pull back its aggressor forces from south Korea. 
					
					Pointing to the illegal nature of the U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea, the article notes: 
					
					The U.S. should accept the resolution of the 30th UN General Assembly and make a bold decision to pull its troops out of south Korea, though belatedly. 
					
					What the U.S. forces have done so far since their occupation of south Korea is nothing but acts of threatening the peace on the peninsula and increasing the danger of war.
					
					The U.S. has reinforced its troops and introduced nuclear weapons in systematic violation of the Armistice Agreement, turning south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in Far East and most dangerous advanced nuclear base. 
					
					The U.S. troops have become more undisguised in their moves for aggression and war in the new century.
					
					The U.S. troops in south Korea are a hot bed of war in the Korean Peninsula and the root cause of threatening and disturbing peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					The withdrawal of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces from south Korea is an irresistible demand of the times. 
					
					The south Korean people are calling for the withdrawal of U.S. troops, holding aloft slogans for independence against the U.S. and national reunification. Voices demanding the U.S. forces' pullback are also heard in the U.S.
					
					The world progressives are also demanding the U.S. troops' withdrawal from south Korea. 
					
					The U.S. forces' pullback from south Korea serves as a barometer judging and verifying whether the U.S. has willingness to ensure peace in the Korean Peninsula or not.
					
					If the U.S. truly has a stand to prevent a war on the peninsula and ensure peace in Northeast Asia, it should boldly withdraw its forces from south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges Authorities to Opt for Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges Authorities to Opt for Peace on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Center for Peace and Disarmament of the Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea in a statement on Tuesday urged the puppet authorities to opt for ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					The present situation more clearly proves that it is impossible to defuse the tension and uneasiness on this land unless the armistice system is replaced by peace-keeping one, the statement said, and went on:
					
					If peace is to be ensured on the Korean Peninsula, the authorities should clarify their will to respect the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and implement them and take measures for cooperation and exchange with the north.
					
					The statement urged the authorities to take military measures for detente.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Studied and Disseminated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Studied and Disseminated Abroad
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Lectures and reading sessions were held by foreign political party and social bodies to study and disseminate the DPRK's joint New Year editorial on Jan. 3 and 4.
					They included the Workers' Party of Mexico, the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche idea, the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy.
					
					Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator (leader) of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, said:
					
					The army and people of the DPRK turned the sorrow at the demise of leader Kim Jong Il into strength and courage and started a grand march for the prosperity of the country in a new century of the Juche era under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the party, state and army of the DPRK, is a great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche, the banner of victory and glory of Songun Korea and the centre of the eternal unity.
					
					The Korean people will always glorify the new century of Kim Il Sung's Korea as one of prosperity and proud victory under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					All the party members of the Mexican party pay highest respects to leader Kim Jong Il and will further consolidate and develop the friendly and cooperative relations based on the genuine comradely friendship with the most authoritative and dignified Workers' Party of Korea led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche idea, noted that the DPRK's cause of building a thriving nation is sure to triumph as long as it is under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and there are the excellent people who remain loyal to the leader generation after generation.
					
					Aba Sadik Abubakr, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, said that he is confident that the Korean people will surely achieve a brilliant victory in the struggle to open the gate to the thriving nation this year, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Foreign Parties, Organizations, Int'l Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Foreign Parties, Organizations, Int'l Body
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the International Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party" issued a joint statement on Jan. 4 in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					We support the joint editorial which reflected the will of the DPRK and the Korean people to invariably inherit the ideas and the causes of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The struggle of the Korean people to implement the tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial is greatly inspiring us.
					
					We will work hard to boost the traditional Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					We call upon the world peace-loving people to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their cause of achieving peace and prosperity by their own efforts, while standing in confrontation with imperialism.
					
					Meanwhile, the C.C., Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Federal Leadership of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany, the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued statements on Jan. 2 and 3 in support of the joint New Year editorial.

articles.title: World People Respect Kim Jong Il as Peerlessly Great Man
articles.content:
World People Respect Kim Jong Il as Peerlessly Great Man
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The greatness of leader Kim Jong Il is expressed in his designations, as many as some 1 200, given by world people.
					They are revering him as the sun, like "sun of Juche", "sun of humankind", "sun of Songun", "sun of revolution" and "sun of life".
					
					VOA praised Kim Jong Il as a political leader rare in the world and socialist statesman and military strategist with a strong faith in socialism. 
					
					Chinese website "Tengxun" in an article selected Kim Jong Il as one of the world's ten strongest statesmen, saying his resoluteness, practical ability and humorous sense go beyond imagination of the West and that south Korean political figures also respect him for his excellent judgment and ample knowledge. 
					
					People across the world also call him "great leader of the 21st century", "greatest man", "champion of justice", "peerlessly great man", "prominent statesman", etc.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il will always live in the hearts of humankind, enjoying deep reverence from world people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Marksmanship Introduced by Regional Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Marksmanship Introduced by Regional Organization
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Suk's marksmanship" on its Internet homepage on Jan. 4.
					Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk was known well as a legendary markswoman, the article said, and went on:
					
					She acquired admiring marksmanship by undergoing tenacious training with burning hatred.
					
					She accurately hit targets with any arms under any conditions.
					
					The woman commander of Mt. Paektu came first in a shooting contest among members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army at a training base in March 1944 and President Kim Il Sung awarded a small pistol to her as citation, the article said.
					
					She, possessed of marksmanship as a crack shot, defended Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life in each battlefield and greatly contributed to the victory of battles, it noted.

articles.title: Mexican Preparatory Committee for Commemorating Day of Sun and Feb. 16 Formed
articles.content:
Mexican Preparatory Committee for Commemorating Day of Sun and Feb. 16 Formed
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- A Mexican preparatory committee was formed on Jan. 6 to commemorate the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., People's Socialist Party of Mexico, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize multifarious political and cultural events on these anniversaries.

articles.title: Hu Jintao Calls for Keeping CPC Pure
articles.content:
Hu Jintao Calls for Keeping CPC Pure
Beijing, January 11 (KCNA) -- Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), called for keeping the party pure on Tuesday.
					Speaking at the 7th Plenary Session of the 17th CPC Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, Hu said all the party members should have a high sense of politics and responsibility and properly carry on the work for maintaining the purity of the party.

articles.title: Chinese Official Calls for Doing Cultural Information Work Well
articles.content:
Chinese Official Calls for Doing Cultural Information Work Well
Beijing, January 11 (KCNA) -- Liu Yunshan, head of the Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), underscored the need to properly organize the ideological and cultural information work.
					In his speech at a meeting of training publicity department heads of the provincial party committees on Jan. 6, Liu said the work is a good tradition of the CPC and its political advantage and that the ideological and cultural information front has heavy responsibility and glorious mission for the party and the people.

articles.title: Increased Capacity for Preventing Quake Damage Urged in China
articles.content:
Increased Capacity for Preventing Quake Damage Urged in China
Beijing, January 11 (KCNA) -- A Chinese vice-premier called for increasing the capacity for preventing earthquake damage on Friday.
					Speaking at a joint meeting of the State Council for preventing and decreasing earthquake damage held in Beijing, Hui Liangyu said that all regions and relevant sectors should make a steady progress in earthquake observation, measurement and forecast, protection of buildings from earthquake and rescue activities.

articles.title: Development of Education Urged in China
articles.content:
Development of Education Urged in China
Beijing, January 11 (KCNA) -- A Chinese State Councilor, Liu Yandong, on Friday called for opening up a new phase of educational development in the country. 
					Speaking at a national meeting on the educational work for 2012, Liu said it is necessary to sincerely implement the educational program and promote impartiality in education.
					
					She also stressed the need to give priority to comprehensively raising the quality of education and make efforts to propel a scientific development of education.

articles.title: Bomb Attacks Claim Many Casualties in Iraq
articles.content:
Bomb Attacks Claim Many Casualties in Iraq
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Two car-bomb attacks were reported in Baghdad on Monday.
					They left twelve people dead and 51 others injured.

articles.title: Internet-Related Law Takes Effect in Belarus
articles.content:
Internet-Related Law Takes Effect in Belarus
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- An amended law has taken effect in Belarus from Friday to strictly control the Internet use.     
					The law is aimed to protect internet users from websites that spread the pornographic culture and foster violence and extremism.

articles.title: Sanctions against Iran Had Nothing for West: Lebanese FM
articles.content:
Sanctions against Iran Had Nothing for West: Lebanese FM
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Lebanese Foreign Minister Adnan Mansour on Jan. 7 said that imposed economic sanctions against Iran have been blessing for Iranians and have had no achievement for the West. 
					Mansour said that due to sanctions, Iranians, by relying on their own power, science and ability, achieved important progress in different fields.

articles.title: President of GuineaÔºçBissau Dies
articles.content:
President of Guinea-Bissau Dies
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Malam Bacai Sanha, president of Guinea-Bissau, died of an illness on Jan. 9, according to a radio of the country.

articles.title: Iran Confirms Uranium Enrichment at New Site
articles.content:
Iran Confirms Uranium Enrichment at New Site
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Iran confirmed that it has begun uranium enrichment at an underground bunker, Iranian diplomats on Monday said at the International Atomic Energy Agency's headquarters.
					The nuclear plant was built near the Shiite holy city of Qom, which was used for producing up to 20 percent enriched uranium.

articles.title: Avian Flu Suspect Dies in Indonesia
articles.content:
Avian Flu Suspect Dies in Indonesia

articles.title: Natural Disasters in Philippines, Brazil and U.S.
articles.content:
Natural Disasters in Philippines, Brazil and U.S.
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The death toll from a recent landslide that hit a gold-rich mining township in southern Philippines rose to 30 as search operations continued, officials said Sunday.
					The governor of Compostela Valley province in Mindanao said at least 30 bodies had been recovered and rescuers were still looking for 44 people who went missing following the landslide that hit Napnapan village, Pantukan town.
					
					Meanwhile, at least six people died on Monday in landslides caused by storms in Rio de Janeiro state, southeastern Brazil, authorities said. The Civil Defense estimates that some 20 people are still missing in the site. In neighboring Minas Gerais state, the situation is worse, and the storms have already caused 15 deaths. About 12 900 people had to leave their homes.
					
					In the U.S., city roads were flooded and thousands of Houston residents lost power Monday after powerful thunderstorms plowed through the area, with a possible tornado damaging and shutting down a nearby mall.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona obras a cargo del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona obras a cargo del EPC
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito de Corea, inspecciono los campos de construccion del Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang, la Carniceria de la Avenida Yongung y otras obras que realizan los militares del EPC.
					Le acogieron en esos lugares los comandantes de las unidades participantes en la construccion.
					
					Averiguo minuciosamente como marchan las obras realizando un largo recorrido.
					
					Pregunto a los comandantes los detalles de las obras, tales como lo que queda por hacer, el suministro de materiales de construccion y los problemas surgidos en la ejecucion.
					
					En su recorrido por el lugar de construccion del parque folclorico que va tomando su figura, se informo de lo que hacen los constructores militares para poner de relieve la excelente cultura y tradiciones de la nacion coreana y averiguo si se construyen como prototipos las miniaturas del Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, el Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste, el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo, el Teatro de Arte Mansudae, etc.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho al saber que los comandantes y los constructores militares idearon con inteligencia creativa e introdujeron metodos innovadores de construccion, que les permitieron impulsar la obra sin pausas pese al mal tiempo de los ultimos dias, y aceleran la construccion a buen ritmo y con calidad mediante trabajos de gran magnitud.
					
					Elogio a los miembros de la directiva de construccion que amplian los exitos tras abrir las perspectivas de terminar a tiempo la construccion al establecer minuciosamente acorde al entusiasmo de los constructores los planes laborales por cada proceso y organizar bien la ejecucion y la direccion de las obras.
					
					Durante el recorrido, el Comandante Supremo dio instrucciones valiosas para construir originalmente los objetos mencionados como creaciones monumentales de la epoca del PTC y la del Songun.
					
					Las obras encargadas por el EPC son las de mucha importancia para llevar a la realidad el deseo de toda la vida del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien se habia esforzado tanto por asegurar al pueblo las condiciones de una vida mas rica y culta, dijo y agrego que por eso, se debe cumplir con responsabilidad la ejecucion de las obras y ordenar bien los solares en armonia con el paisaje natural del contorno.
					
					Hay que construir cada objeto de modo impecable en el remoto futuro tambien tomando como directiva la autoctona idea y teoria del partido sobre la estetica arquitectonica, instruyo.
					
					El Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang ha de ser construido en el principio historicista y conforme a la estetica de arquitectura contemporanea, de modo que los habitantes, jovenes y ninos escolares puedan tener aqui un buen descanso y adquirir muchos conocimientos, dijo.
					
					Hizo enfasis en materializar cabalmente las orientaciones del partido de imprimir el caracter plastico y artistico en la arquitectura para construir todas las miniaturas en el maximo nivel, de tal manera que ellas se vean como verdaderas tanto de lejos como de cerca.
					
					La construccion del parque folclorico es una obra dificil que cuesta mucho trabajo y tiene muchos problemas que esperan soluciones tecnologicas, apunto.
					
					Por esta razon, hay que impulsar la obra sin interrupcion introduciendo racionales y cientificos metodos de construccion y acondicionar buenas facilidades de visita, dijo y tomo las medidas correspondientes.
					
					La Carniceria de la Avenida Yongung, que sera frecuentada por los habitantes, debe ser construida en el principio de facilitar al maximo el confort de los clientes, senalo y anadio que para ello, se debe realizar la ejecucion asegurando el caracter popular y amable de esta tienda.
					
					Puesto que marcha en etapa crucial la obra, las unidades vinculadas deben realizar con esmero las gestiones para suministrar a tiempo en lo suficiente los materiales y medios de transporte necesarios a la construccion.
					
					Kim Jong Un expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores militares terminaran en las fechas previstas los objetos en construccion librando la ofensiva general con el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de ataque "De un tiron".

articles.title: Dos "torpedos No.1" demuestran apogeo de invencion
articles.content:
Dos "torpedos No.1" demuestran apogeo de invencion
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- Sin Sang Chol, miembro del grupo de averiguacion conjunta para el caso del hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", inserto el dia 9 en el periodico Online del Sur de Corea un articulo revelando la verdad del caso de hundimiento.
					En su articulo, el insistio en que llego ya a una conclusion de que no hubo explosion ninguna causante del hundimiento de la corbeta y nego el hecho de que estallo el torpedo debajo de la corbeta.
					
					Expuso claramente que no existe el torpedo.
					
					Precisamente la censura respecto al torpedo es una invencion, asevero y continuo:
					
					El Ministerio de Defensa concluyo que la corbeta fue hundida a causa de una explosion y lo publico oficialmente. Un dia despues de 15 dias de la publicacion, el grupo de averiguacion conjunta anuncio que descubrio el torpedo explorando por todas partes del fondo del mar cercano al hundimiento de popa de barco y dio publicidad a la opinion publica el diseno y una foto del torpedo.
					
					Sin embargo, el torpedo publicado por el Ministerio de Defensa recibio una lluvia de censura.
					
					No son iguales las medidas del diseno, ?Por que el valor numeral del diseno es centimetros?, los terminos no son del Norte, ?Por que esta tan corrupto aunque esta sumergido durante apenas mas de 50 dias?, ?Con que puede confirmar que el torpedo es del Norte? y otras preguntas presentaron.
					
					Despues de sospechas, el grupo publico el 20 de mayo del 2010 el "torpedo No.1" del Norte metido en la caja de vidrio.
					
					Con la aparicion del torpedo real, la foto del torpedo publicada hace 5 dias se alejo de la atencion del publico.
					
					Pero, el torpedo real No.1 provoco la otra sospecha.
					
					Al examinar minuciosamente el torpedo en foto y el otro en la caja de vidrio, no es igual absolutamente.
					
					De un vistazo, parece que los dos son similares. Pero al comparar unos con otros, es facil aclarar que los dos torpedos son diferentes.
					
					Dejo claramente las huellas de que se esforzaban tanto por elaborar el primero parecido al segundo.
					
					Al filmar con la camera de proximidad, es transparente la huella acunada por prensa para hacerlos de manera similar.
					
					Al cabo de la discusion de los abogados sobre los dos torpedos diferentes, sus criterios claros se presentaron al juicio como pruebas.
					
					?Como piensan ustedes sobre el hecho de que no es uno sino dos el torpedo que demuestra el rastro de limpieza de la herrumbre para grabar las letras "No.1", apogeo de invencion?
